alert.note: Alert for Goshen; Laramie (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 27 at 5:14PM MDT until May 27 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cheyenne has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Scotts Bluff County in the Panhandle of Nebraska... Western Banner County in the Panhandle of Nebraska... Southeastern Goshen County in southeastern Wyoming... Eastern Laramie County in southeastern Wyoming... * Until 600 PM MDT. * At 513 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles east of Albin, or 20 miles northwest of Kimball, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... La Grange. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
